__e: I don't like it any more than you do, But a marine's life is on the line.
I mean, not good a Marine is dead but good that the case is no longer ours.
The Navy is my life, and one thing I know, there can only be one captain of a ship.
Better when I see a ship with USS come to port.
I am a lieutenant commander in the United States Navy.
Sir, permit me to inform you, sir... that I am damn proud of being an Annapolis man, sir.
